short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save links and make cycles quickly

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A faster way to save links which you are learning or reading, create cycles for them using spaced repetition technique.

How to use it:
1- Click the Learn Cycle button on toolbar
2- Make sure you are authenticated on https://app.learncycle.space
3- Click the button "Make Cycle" to create a spaced repetition cycle for recall or click  "Just Save" for saving link.

Keep Learning, use Learn Cycle, use Spaced Repetition Technique.
